column1: Life is too short to remove USB safely
I'm not arguing I'm just explaining why I'm right.
Success is not final failure is not fatal
column2: it is the courage to continue that counts.

column1: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
Happiness is not something ready-made it comes from your own actions.
You don’t have to be great to start but you have to start to be great.
If at first you don’t succeed skydiving is not for you.
I’m reading a book on anti gravity it's impossible to put down.
We spend too much time earning a living and not enough time living.
Your life does not get better by chance
Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.
